database.title: Oracle released its latest database Oracle 12g
database.body: Yestaday Oracle has released its new database Oracle 12g, this would make more money for this company and lead to a nice profit report of annual year.

database.title: Oracle released its profit report of 2015
database.body: As expected, Oracle released its profit report of 2015, during the good sales of database and hardware, Oracle's profit of 2015 reached 12.5 Billion.
